menuTemplate.action: function( track, feature, div ){var top_url = (window.location != window.parent.location)? document.referrer: document.location.href; var pre_url = top_url.split('/');  var taxid = this.feature[7]; var new_url = ['https:/' , pre_url[2], 'organism', taxid, 'gene', this.feature[4]].join('/'); return window.parent.location=new_url}
menuTemplate.label: load this gene page

onClick.action: function( track, feature, div ){var top_url = (window.location != window.parent.location)? document.referrer: document.location.href; var pre_url = top_url.split('/');  var taxid = this.feature[7]; var new_url = ['https:/' , pre_url[2], 'organism', taxid, 'gene', this.feature[4]].join('/'); return window.parent.location=new_url}
onClick.label: right-click for more options
